snippet: Ms. Smith helped redefine the role of publicist from relentless promoter to savvy protector of star clients like Robert Redford and Meryl Streep.
abstract: Lois Smith, longtime publicist to the stars, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Smith helped redefine the role of publicist from relentless promoter to savvy protector of star clients like Robert Redford and Meryl Streep.

headline.seo: Lois Smith, Publicist for Stars, Dies at 84
headline.main: Lois Smith, Publicist Who Mothered Star Clients, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Lois Smith, 84, A Publicist Who Mothered Star Clients
